fields.label: Course downloaded
fields.helper_text: Number of points for downloading the course

fields.label: Quiz first attempt
fields.helper_text: Number of points for first attempt at a quiz

fields.label: Quiz attempt
fields.helper_text: Number of points for attempting a quiz

fields.label: Quiz first attempt threshold
fields.helper_text: Threshold to get the first attempt bonus (should be 1-100)

fields.label: Quiz first attempt bonus
fields.helper_text: Bonus points for getting above the threshold on first attempt at a quiz

fields.label: Activity Completed
fields.helper_text: Number of points for completing an activity

fields.label: Media started
fields.helper_text: Number of points for opening media

fields.label: Media playing interval
fields.helper_text: Number of seconds to get the points per interval

fields.label: Media points per interval
fields.helper_text: Number of points per interval of having media open

fields.label: Media max points
fields.helper_text: Maximum number of points for any media play

fields.label: Badge awarded
fields.helper_text: Number of points for being awarded a badge
